description: Try our easy to follow Beef And Mushroom Cottage Pie recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Shepherd's & cottage pie,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Mushroom,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Mince,Peanut free
name: Beef And Mushroom Cottage Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring potatoes to the boil, reduce heat & simmer for 10-15 mins, until soft.
Meanwhile heat oil in a fry pan. Cook onion for 2 mins. Add mushrooms, cook for 2-3 mins until softened.
Add garlic and mince, cook for 5-8 mins until browned. Stir in peas & Campbells Soup. Simmer for 2-3 mins. Spoon into a 2 litre (8 cup) casserole/baking dish.
Drain potatoes, mash then add milk & stir until smooth & creamy. Spread over meat mixture. Top with cheese & bake for 15- 20 mins or until golden brown.
